item.description:
People interested in participating in BSA Young Professional Network (YPNet) activities met on July 17th and decided to set up a leadership team/ committee to direct event-planning and set up a system for future leadership. The idea is that young professionals from different building industry backgrounds will plan tours, events, workshops and/ or other fun activities for the larger YPNet community. They will also make sure to plan for future leadership so that when people cycle off, others will take over.

If you are interested in participating in in YPNet Leadership please come to a planning meeting at the BSA. All are welcome- membership is not required.

Make sure to RSVP to the BSA by noon on the day of the meeting to insure ample pizza and beer: bsa@architects.org
item.how_to_find_us: Take the elevator to the 5th floor
item.name: YPNet Leadership Planning Meeting
